content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <metadata xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:fn="http://www.w3.org/2005/xpath-functions" xmlns:xdt="http://www.w3.org/2005/xpath-datatypes"> <idinfo> <citation> <citeinfo> <origin>Bureau of Ocean Energy Management</origin> <pubdate>20150129</pubdate> <title>2017-2022 Draft Proposed Program - Withdrawal Areas</title> <pubinfo> <pubplace>Herndon, VA</pubplace> <publish>Bureau of Ocean Energy Management</publish> </pubinfo> <onlink>http://geoplatform.maps.arcgis.com/sharing/rest/content/items/64bbcf5e68724aa3a9b156eb0037d0b5/data?token=BAMZdavIKTAu4upRTGUyoMSoplx5CH5ciufQdBw7ZPE3fdfj-UouItAcMkMqDkEhCdXYy6yryVRlKU7tqfzZfc4wnncyubjZ_K_Upy1a6rfnFB3nNwUqHq79gexEq19qTGWnGd3fU-sVh_C-AUyPjTwfVM87PIeDg9GP0qdoPAsQLxyqtMZ80_eyZA7RZ11L</onlink> <onlink>http://www.boem.gov/Five-Year-Program/</onlink> <onlink>http://services1.arcgis.com/Hp6G80Pky0om7QvQ/arcgis/rest/services/2017-2022_Draft_Proposed_Program_for_Oil_and_Gas_Leasing_on_the_OCS_Withdrawal_Areas/FeatureServer/0</onlink> </citeinfo> </citation> <descript> <abstract>This file represents the areas of the Outer Continental Shelf that have been withdrawn from disposition by leasing.  The withdrawal of these areas prevents consideration of these areas for future oil or gas leasing for purposes of exploration, development, or production.</abstract> <purpose> This file represents a 25-mile coastal buffer, subsistence use area, and Hanna Shoal area within the Bureau of Ocean Energy Management-designated Chukchi Sea Planning Area; and two whaling use areas (Barrow and Kaktovik) within the Beaufort Sea Planning Area withdrawn from any future oil or gas leasing activities for a time period without specific expiration using the President's authority under section 12(a) of the OCS Lands Act.  President designated this portion of the Chukchi Sea and Beaufort Sea as off limits from consideration for future oil and gas leasing in order to protect areas of critical importance to subsistence use by Alaska Natives, as well as for their unique and sensitive environmental resources.   This file also represents the presidential withdrawal on December 16, 2014, of the North Aleutian Basin Planning Area; the decision to withdraw the area from all future oil and gas leasing extends indefinitely a temporary withdrawal that President Obama issued in 2010 and was set to expire in 2017.   A portion of the Central Gulf of Mexico Planning Area (CPA) and most of the Eastern Gulf of Mexico Planning Area (EPA) is under restriction until 2022 as part of the Gulf of Mexico Energy Security Act of 2006.  The area restricted is that portion of EPA within 125 miles of Florida, all areas in the Gulf of Mexico east of the Military Mission Line (86\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd 41\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd west longitude), and the area within the CPA that is within 100 miles of Florida. </purpose> </descript> <timeperd> <timeinfo> <sngdate> <caldate>20150130</caldate> </sngdate> </timeinfo> <current>Publication date</current> </timeperd> <status> <progress>Complete</progress> <update>As needed</update> </status> <spdom> <bounding> <westbc>-168.976949</westbc> <eastbc>-70.043161</eastbc> <northbc>74.996354</northbc> <southbc>25.581983</southbc> </bounding> </spdom> <keywords> <theme> <themekt>ISO 19115 Topic Category</themekt> <themekey>boundaries</themekey> <themekey>environment</themekey> <themekey>oceans</themekey> <themekey>planningCadastre</themekey> </theme> </keywords> <accconst>None.</accconst> <useconst>None.
